title: Special, research, or demonstration project positions
context: [§76-11.6] Special, research, or demonstration project positions. Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, with the approval of the governor, the head of a department may establish and abolish any subordinate position for an employee engaged in a special, research, or demonstration project that is approved by the governor, subject to the limitations of available appropriations. [L 2015, c 160, §3]
